import bg1 from "../assets/1.jpg"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; const About = () => { return (
{/* ===== ABOUT HEADER ===== */}

About Climatrix

Climatrix is an AI-driven climate intelligence system designed to enhance rainfall forecasting and disaster preparedness across Sri Lanka.

{/* ===== INFORMATION SECTION ===== */}
Why Climatrix?

Sri Lanka faces increasing risks from floods, landslides, and extreme rainfall. Traditional forecasting methods often lack accuracy and early warning capability.

What We Do

We combine machine learning models with historical and real-time climate data to predict rainfall patterns and identify potential disaster risks before they occur.

Who Benefits

Government agencies, disaster management authorities, researchers, and communities can use Climatrix insights to make informed, timely decisions.

{/* ===== CONTACT & QUERY ===== */}

Contact & Queries

Email: support@climatrix.lk

Phone: +94 77 123 4567

Location: Sri Lanka

{/* ===== FOOTER ===== */}
); }; export default About;
